      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String Commands.createCustomer(Customer c)
      Creates valid SQL-syntax for inserting Customer data from an object into a database table named Customer.
      Customer Nexus.createEntryCustomer(Customer c)
      This method sends a request to a database to create a post in a specific table using the Customer object from the parameter.
      boolean Nexus.deleteCustomer(Customer c)
      This method requests the database connected to this class that it deletes a post in a table with information corresponding EXACTLY to the object passed in the parameter.
      static java.lang.String Commands.deleteCustomer(Customer c)

      These methods are responsible for taking in ResultSets from the database and returning them as HashMaps, usable in the Nexus and especially for further use in the controller.
